price: ߟߍߙߊ ߟߊߖߌ߱ ߝߘߊߣߍ߲߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫߸ ߣߌ߬ߣߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߥߘߋ߬ߥߘߋ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi mina al-lahi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
